description:
We are an IT Outsourcing, Consultancy, Annotation and BPO company based in Vietnam and Japan. We cater to SME and MNC’s all around the globe by providing high-end services at a cost-competitive price.

With 7+ years of IT Consultancy and Outsourcing, BeetSoft is playing a stellar role in honing the skills of professionals, assisting companies to achieve success in their operating field of specialisation. We as an organisation have grown rapidly in the past three years, now with operating offices in Hanoi, Vietnam and Tokyo, Japan with over 600 employees.

Beetsoft specialises in IT Outsourcing, IT Consulting, Application Development, Software Development, Game Development, Web Development, System Development, AR VR MR, AI & IoT, Annotation & BPO.

description:
Sota Tek is a leading Software Development Company established in 2015, headquartered in Hanoi, Vietnam, with international offices in Osaka and Tokyo, Japan. Our company name, Sota Tek stands for "State of the art Technology”, representing our product standards and our desire to conquer new peaks of technology.

At Sota Tek, we deliver full-cycle services that cover all aspects of Software Engineering. Whether you are a startup or a major corporation, through intensive two-way communication, we gain deep insights into your business vision, bringing you the most optimal suite and cost-effective solutions.

portfolios.des: A project that combines the world’s map and blockchain. Users can support the map by providing information about the environment, infrastructure and earn rewards as crypto coins.
Launching an ICO for a dating social platform. We're in charge of developing the smart contract for token sale in the Ethereum platform.

Bables Prime is a mobile app for appointment setting. service fees payment for customers of Prime Massage Centre. Using Bables, the centre's adminstrators s can also manage information of both employees and customers on the same system.
We designed UI/UX and implemented the website from the scratch. We made this website including a back-end CMS for them to update news, data, and manage their list of angel investors

AISX Crypto Currency Exchange was developed and designed especially for the Japanese and Mongolian traders, who have specific needs for currency exchange. AISX's interface is user-friendly while maintaining high security and liquidity.

EZ Wallet is a personal wallet application, which is completely offline, allowing users to save all important information separately on their private devices. EZ- Wallet supports a wide range of coins, including but not limited to: BTC, ETH & ERC20, XRP, ZCASH, DASH, USDT …

This system provides liquidity solutions for Spot Exchange platforms. The machine is capable of supporting at least 3 other exchanges at the same time, the exchange rate displayed is referred from various reliable sources to ensure constant and stable liquidity
Cosplay serves as an online community for professional cosplayers across the world to communicate and connect with each other and their fans as well.

SOTA - a multi-chain digital content NFT P2P marketplace for creators and collectors. In Sota Finance, we enable easy creation and transaction of Limited Digital Content Editions secured with blockchain to mass users.

A financial hub for Korean clinics and hospitals to manage earnings, tracking expenses and getting statistical and analytical insights. Data analytics and machine learning is also used in this project
Asset Genius focuses on Real Estate Tech and provides a platform for real estate investors and management companies.

A real time stock trading app for Android platform. It was designed to strictly compliance with business logic, helping users with convenient experience and most updated data. This app use C/C++ as underlying communication stack to ensure security, accuracy and to reduce

SocialGood is an asset that everyone can receive for free just by shopping at 1800+ partner retail stores, such as Amazon, Apple, Alibaba, eBay, Lazada, Nike, etc (Shopping Mining). The platform works in a way in which the more users increase, the more the asset value increases.
An online platform that helps people to learn Japanese. Includes more than 500 lecture videos and hundreds of JLPT problems. You can also create your own problem sets or movies!

Viewty can measure and evaluate the skin condition (wrinkles, texture, stains, translucency, moisture, pores, skin quality, skin age) in 8 items. By making Viewty available across a wide variety of brands, the app has made recommendations based on your skin data in a fair position.

The VC Wallet is one part of our whole ambitious Value Project, which includes a Cryptocurrency Exchange, Mining, Coupon Exchange Private DEX, Social Network System, etc. It supports Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), ValueCoin (FVC), Genesis (GOD), and other Ethereum-based ERC20 tokens.

An AI platform solution with the ability to collect, label, training, testing medical images from a wide range of hospitals, medical institutions. In the output, it analyzes the images and automatically detects different kinds of diseases such as Brain Aneurysm, Spine Fracture and Dental Cyst.
Implementation and operation of Wallet/smart contract for ICO of Decentralized Travel Booking Marketplace. Raised US$ 2 million in the funding of token sales.
A customized platform where influencers such as celebrities, singers, gymnastics, ... start live streaming with their fans and earn money through online gifts and subscriptions.

This is a centralized instant exchange platform developed for Japanese partners. It supports converting among a wide range of coins and tokens constantly. It also includes the feature for users to buy coins/tokens via VISA card.

This is a full-fledged centralized crypto-currency exchange software that supports both crypto-crypto and crypto-fiat. Listing: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Bitcoin Cash, Ripple, Litecoin, Ethereum Classic, Dash, Neo, Qtum and other ERC-20 Tokens. Fiat: Korea Won
This project applies blockchain to the real estate industry. We are in charge of all the technical stuff in this ICO. The ICO token sale development is based on NEO platform.

This is a decentralized exchange platform that raised 55 million USD through its ICO. Its on-chain liquidity protocol allows decentralized token swaps to be integrated into any application, enabling value exchange to be performed seamlessly between all parties in the ecosystem.

SotaTek was in charge of the blockchain technical aspect in the ICO to support pre-sale, crowd sales, allowing users to buy tokens using BTC, ETH. This is not a usual ICO where users can buy the ERC20 token from both ETH & BTC.

Bitkoex is a crypto-currency exchange, focusing mainly on serving the Korean Market. The Exchange enables various coin exchanges as well as exchanges in KRW (Korean Won). The Bitgo Wallet app was also integrated into the platform, which guarantees the highest level of data security.

Amanpuri Exchange was one of our major projects, which owns MSB (Money Services Business) License in the United States, expanded its community around the world, and gained a high reputation from the community.

SotaTek developed and updated a Hospital Management Windows Software that has been operating in more than 150 hospitals across Japan. We managed to change and use an up-to-date technology which is C# .Net and Oracle framework.

Koindex uses a memory-bound algorithm that can handle 2 million transactions per second. An advanced API trading interface that supports many orders providing a wide range of technical support to professional investors.

Leading Crypto Currency Exchange in Vietnam, with large trading volume and trusted partners. VCCE facilitates not only the exchange of crypto-currencies but also easy withdrawal, deposit as well as cash exchange

description:

portfolios.des: PowerGate team developed and managed one of the most popular e-scooter mobile apps in South East Asia. Our application innovates the way of people move, get people out of their cars and onto scooters.

description:

description: NNG is a team of talented developers, designers, and marketers located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Our company formed due to increasing demand and growth of the IT sector around the world and for the love of technology. Our company's founders are western educated and our clientele spans around the globe from North America, Europe, and to Asia.

Enlab is a dedicated offshore software development company in Vietnam, one of the top-ranked countries in software outsourcing in the world. Our focus is to provide excellent custom enterprise solutions with top-notch quality in every Agile delivery.

Our technology stacks include: ASP.NET, WCF/WebAPI, ASP.NET Core, Python/Django, PHP, Laravel, StreamInsight, T-SQL Programming, SQL Server, MongoDB, ExtJS, Ext.NET, DevExpress, Telerik, Kendo UI, Angular, VueJS, HTML5, CSS3, Xamarin, Flutter, Azure, AWS.

We offer a wide range of services for enterprises, startups, IT consulting vendors, digital agencies across the sea: Web application development, Cross-platform app development in Xamarin and Flutter, Software customization and enhancement.

We have experience in different domains and industries like real estate, construction, education, data management, procurement, marketing, recruitment, and ERP.
